issue.title: N4474 Unified Call Syntax: x.f(y) and f(x,y), N4165 Unified Call Syntax, N4174 Call syntax: x.f(y) vs. f(x,y)

discussion.p: Discussed in Urbana. EWG favored being able to invoke non-members with the member call syntax, and was undecided on the other aspects. Authors are encouraged to follow up.

Discussed in Lenexa. EWG didn't reach consensus on the proposal. Straw poll numbers were SF/WF/N/WA/SA 9/8/3/4/6. There is strong opposition to the proposal with concerns about maintainability of code when new free functions are added.
